abstract: Apple agreed to make a one-time payment to Nokia and to pay regular royalties in the future to license some of Nokia’s patents.
snippet: Apple agreed to make a one-time payment to Nokia and to pay regular royalties in the future to license some of Nokia’s patents.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Nokia said on Tuesday that it had settled a two-year-old patent fight with Apple over smartphone technology through a licensing agreement that will commit Apple to make a one-time payment to the company and to pay regular royalties in the future.

headline.main: Nokia Settles 2-Year Fight With Apple on Patents
headline.print_headline: Nokia Settles 2-Year Fight With Apple On Patents

abstract: J.C. Penney hopes that Ron Johnson, a man who rethought how to sell computers, can also rethink how to sell clothes, cosmetics and accessories.
snippet: J.C. Penney hopes that Ron Johnson, a man who rethought how to sell computers, can also rethink how to sell clothes, cosmetics and accessories.
lead_paragraph: J. C. Penney has poached the head of Apple’s retail stores to head the department store chain, betting that a deity of the digerati can revive its sales in the same way he found success in brick-and-mortar stores for Apple.

headline.main: Apple Stores Chief to Take the Helm at J.C. Penney
headline.print_headline: Apple Stores Chief to Take the Helm at J.C. Penney

byline.original: By Stephanie Clifford and Miguel Helft

abstract: News of J. C. Penney hiring Apple’s head of retail operations has made William Ackman a paper profit of $475.9 million.
snippet: News of J. C. Penney hiring Apple’s head of retail operations has made William Ackman a paper profit of $475.9 million.
lead_paragraph: William A. Ackman is a very happy investor today.

headline.main: Ackman Scores Big With Penney’s Latest Hire

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
